abstract: Coalition of Nebraskan Republican, Democratic and independent lawmakers back state bill that would replace capital punishment with life imprisonment, citing various reasons for their support of repeal; Republican Gov Pete Ricketts promises to veto legislation.
lead_paragraph: In a sign that vigorous support for capital punishment can no longer be taken for granted among Republicans, a bipartisan group of legislators has backed a bill to eliminate it.

headline.main: Conservative Support Aids Bid in Nebraska to Ban Death Penalty
headline.print_headline: Conservative Support Aids Bid in Nebraska to Ban Death Penalty

snippet: In a sign that vigorous support for capital punishment can no longer be taken for granted among Republicans, a bipartisan group of legislators has backed a bill to eliminate it.
